name: ext-text
docs:
Text utilities (trim/split/join/find/lines) built on bytes.

Modules:
- std.text
- std.text.ws
- std.text.lines
- std.text.split
- std.text.join
- std.text.find
- std.text.tests

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-text@0.1.0 --sync
- Import std.text (or specific modules).

Notes:
- Bytes-first (explicit UTF-8 helpers live in std.text.utf8 / ext.unicode).
- Determinism: pure
